name: updateMssqlHostConfig
description: Updates the configuration for a specified host.

host_id.description: ID of the SQL Server host to update the host configuration.

body.description: SQL Server host configuration properties to update.

$ul: **enableDatabaseBatchSnapshots**: Defines the boolean type for host configuration. 'Enabled' specifies true, 'Disabled' specifies False, and 'Default' specifies to delete the entry and default to the global configuration.

**enableGroupFetch**: Defines the boolean type for host configuration. 'Enabled' specifies true, 'Disabled' specifies False, and 'Default' specifies to delete the entry and default to the global configuration.

**enableVdi**: Defines the boolean type for host configuration. 'Enabled' specifies true, 'Disabled' specifies False, and 'Default' specifies to delete the entry and default to the global configuration.

**enableVdiDb**: Defines the boolean type for host configuration. 'Enabled' specifies true, 'Disabled' specifies False, and 'Default' specifies to delete the entry and default to the global configuration.
**fileRestoreReadParallelism**: Number of concurrent read requests for restoring a file from the Rubrik cluster to a remote host.
**fileRestoreWriteParallelism**: Number of concurrent write requests for restoring a file from the Rubrik cluster to a remote host.
**fileTransferParallelism**: Number of concurrent requests for transferring a file from a remote host to the Rubrik cluster.
**mssqlDefaultMaxDataStreamsPerDatabase**: The default value for maximum number of data streams per database.
**physicalHostDatabaseRestoreThrottleMaxRefCount**: The maximum number of concurrent database restore job running on a host.
**physicalHostLogBackupThrottleMaxRefCount**: Maximum number of concurrent SQL Server log backup jobs per physical host.
**throttlePhysicalHostMaxRefCount**: Maximum number of concurrent snapshots per physical host.
